none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on September 05, 2012 Description from Terminal Escape:
Four glorious minutes of churning Japanese hardcore with crazed vocals and guitars pushed to their absolute limit. It's a pretty simple formula: turn the shit up and fukkn GO!, but when the shit it right then it's all you need and ULTIMO RAUSEA have been making it right for almost 20 years. Three tracks from 2004, get busy. INUIKA
//1.bp.blogspot.com/-ZhKtSJUM3io/UEdN2QphOdI/AAAAAAAAEig/IDfEGwVowas/s1600/ultimo+rausea+copy.jpg //4.bp.blogspot.com/-qxe5_2ZsT3M/UEdOfFa-tWI/AAAAAAAAEio/9iZ8eMpZVfQ/s1600/ultimo+rausea+back+copy.jpg

seo.title: Ultimo Rausea - Inuika cassette 2004 - Terminal Escape
